titleStmt.title: Englands vnthankfulnes for Gods mercie A sermon preached at a funerall at Strovvd in Gloustershire the 16. of August. 1621. By W.W. Doctor in Diuinity.

titleStmt.author: Woodwall, William.

titleStmt.title: Englands vnthankfulnes for Gods mercie A sermon preached at a funerall at Strovvd in Gloustershire the 16. of August. 1621. By W.W. Doctor in Diuinity.
Sermon upon Ezechiel
titleStmt.author: Woodwall, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by A. Mathewes?] for Iohn Marriott,

notesStmt.note: Another issue, with cancel title page, of STC 25970: Woodwall, WIlliam. A sermon upon Ezechiel.

Includes: "A prouerbe pronounced to all the cruell, couetous, and hard-hearted corne-maisters" and "A meditation upon the 26 verse of the. 11. chapter of the Prouerbes; which may fitly be called, the poore-mans plea", each with caption title.
Identified as STC 24923 on UMI microfilm reel 1044.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
